## References

::: {#refs}
:::

```{r copy-bibliography}
#| cache: false
#| echo: false

quarto::quarto_inspect(profile=NULL) |>
	(\(x) list(x$dir, x$config$format$html$bibliography))() |>
	do.call(what=file.path) |>
	sprintf(fmt='mkdir --parents share && cp %s share/bibliography.bib') |>
	system()
```
